sentences: En ole koskaan nähnyt tätä elokuvaa.
context: The Finnish word 'koskaan' is an adverb that means 'never' or 'not ever'. It's used to indicate that something has not happened at any time in the past, present, or future. In negative sentences (with 'ei'), it follows the auxiliary verb, as in 'En ole koskaan...' (I have never...). When used with interrogative words like 'onko' (is/has), it forms questions about whether something has ever happened.
